definitions.title: n.m. issue
definitions.body: (Ar. d-awbun fluid, liquid; NH [[זוֹב]], Aram. [[דּוֹבָא]] in specif. sense of Heb.);—issue, flux, alw. fr. genitals (cf. Di Le 15:2); only P: of man or woman Le 15:33; —of man Le 15:2, Le 15:3, Le 15:3, Le 15:3, Le 15:13, Le 15:15; of woman Le 15:19 ([[דָּם יִהְיֶה זׁבָהּ]] [[בִּבְשָׂרָהּ]] of monthly period); also v:Le 15:25, v:Le 15:25, v:Le 15:26, v:Le 15:28, v:Le 15:30 (of morbid issue of blood, sts. connected with the other; cf. Mt 9:20 etc.)
